#summary The API of the *expand* method in Jasperoo.

= Introduction =
The *expand* method adds support for additional formats of reports from a predetermined collection of valid formats. This can also be accomplished by referencing the formats parameter during *setup*. [JasperooMethodsSetup setup] must be called prior to calling *expand*.
{{{
jasperoo add --type ~.domain.SomeType [-- finder findSomeTypeBySomething] [--entityPackage ~.domain] [--controllerPackage ~.web]
}}}

== Parameters ==
=== type ===
*required*
The entity upon which to report.
=== finder ===
*optional*
If specified, this finder will produce the resultset to be passed to the List report.

=== entityPackage ===
*optional*
The location of the Entities. Default: "~.domain".

=== controllerPackage ===
*optional*
The location of the Web Controllers. Default: "~.web".
